original_text: It will be like a hot oven that I put you in. It will be like an oven where men cause different metals to melt to make them pure. Because I am very angry with you, I will bring you into the city to punish you there.
korean_text: 사람이 은이나 놋이나 쇠나 납이나 주석이나 모아서 풀무 불 속에 넣고 불을 불어 녹이는 것 같이 내가 노여움과 분으로 너희를 모아 거기에 두고 녹이리라

sentences.original_text: It will be like a hot oven
It will be like an oven
where men cause different metals to melt
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들이 여러 금속을 녹게 하는 곳

sentences.original_text: Because I am very angry with you
I will bring you into the city
